title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Republic of China (Taiwan)
description: -,Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Republic of China (Taiwan)
sitename: Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Republic of China (Taiwan)
cleaned_text: After visiting our representative office, a TV station and a Taiwanese business association in Indonesia, Taiwan's teen diplomatic envoys went to see the country's legislature, the People's Consultative Assembly. Yohannes O.I. Tahapari, the head of the parliamentary press office, explained to them how the assembly is organized.
